details.arabic_diacless: على اللٰه توكلنا‌ ۚربنا لا تجعلنا فتنة لـلقوم الظٰلمينۙ
details.arabic: عَلَى اللّٰهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا‌ ۚرَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةً لِّـلۡقَوۡمِ الظّٰلِمِيۡنَۙ
details.transliteration: Alal Allahi thawakkalna rabbana la taj'alna fitnatal lil-qawmidh-Dhalimeen.
details.translations: Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people

details.transliteration: Wa najjina bi-Rahmatika minal qawmil kafireen.
details.translations: And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people.
